sidebar.emptyChatsTitle: Your chats will be displayed here.
sidebar.emptyChatsDescription: Interact with Ayunis Core and ask any questions.
sidebar.deleteChatDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this chat? This action cannot be undone.

chatInput.placeholder: Ask a question in Ayunis Core...
chatInput.selectPrompt: Add a prompt from your library
chatInput.fileSourceEmptyDataError: The uploaded file contains no processable data
chatInput.invalidFileTypeError: This file type is currently not supported.
chatInput.fileSourceTooLargeError: File is too large. Maximum file size is 50MB.
chatInput.fileSourceTooManyPagesError: Document has too many pages to process.
chatInput.fileSourceServiceBusyError: The document processing service is busy. Please try again later.
chatInput.fileSourceTimeoutError: Document processing timed out. The file may be too complex.
chatInput.sourceNotFound: File not found. It may have been deleted.
chatInput.imageLimitExceeded: Maximum {{max}} images allowed. Some images were not added.
chatInput.noEmbeddingModelEnabled: To upload documents, an embedding model must be enabled.
chatInput.modelChangeDisabledTooltip: The model cannot be changed when an agent is selected.
chatInput.anonymousModeEnabled: Anonymous mode enabled - PII will be redacted
chatInput.anonymousModeDisabled: Click to enable anonymous mode (redacts personal data)
chatInput.anonymousModeEnforced: Privacy mode is required by this model
chatInput.fileSourceDisabled: To upload documents, an embedding model must be enabled.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please reload the page to continue.
